visionsandgolas.title: أهدافنا
visionsandgolas.description: تعزيز التخطيط الحضري ، متابعة مؤشرات التنمية الإقليمية  ، دعم الجهود الاستثمارية في المنطقة ، بناء الشراكات والاتفاقيات مع القطاعات التنموية بالمنطقة.

visionsandgolas.title: رؤيتنا
visionsandgolas.description: يمثل المرصد الحضري خطوة محورية نحو تحقيق بيئة حضرية مستدامة، ويسهم في رفع جودة الحياة والارتقاء بمستوى الخدمات لسكان منطقة الباحة.

partners.title: Success Partners
partners.description: We are proud of our partnership with over 200 local and global strategic alliances, paving the way for a bright future

header.title: Observatory Library
header.cta: The Observatory Library offers a collection of reports and documents highlighting the latest projects, studies, and achievements, providing visitors with an in-depth look into the journey of development and innovation.

header.title: Library
header.cta: Explore a collection of images and videos showcasing our latest projects, development vision, and behind-the-scenes work at the Albaha Observatory. Enjoy a visual tour that reflects the quality and innovation in our work.

header.title: Latest News and Updates
header.cta: Stay up to date with the latest news, reports, and updates about the Albaha Region Observatory.

header.title: Get in Touch with Albaha Observatory
header.cta2: Contact us – we’d love to hear from you!

hero.title: Albaha Region
hero.description: Albaha City is the capital of the Albaha Region and the seat of the emirate. It is one of Saudi Arabia's most important cities in terms of tourism and agriculture. The region is named after it and holds the administrative and commercial center. It hosts government offices, major commercial centers, and traditional markets, the most notable being Thursday Market. Albaha has a population of approximately 487,108 residents spread across the city and its governorates. It is surrounded by numerous forests such as Raghadan, Shahba, Dar Al-Jabal, and Zarqa. It borders Al-Qura Governorate to the north, Al-Mandaq and Al-Mukhwah to the west, Baljurashi to the south, and Al-Aqiq to the east.

directions.desc1: Residents are spread across the city, nearby suburbs, and villages. Many work in government sectors, the military, agriculture, trade, and education.
directions.desc2: Albaha City is located in the southwest of Saudi Arabia and serves as a central point among various tourist destinations.
